name: Walk the Plank (itch)
description:
You are a pirate captain on his last walk over the plank.Try to impress your crew, survive dark creatures and rescue your hat.

Here are the keys you need to play:

s = jump / don't blink
arrows = to perform the moves
down when swimming=dive

I hope you enjoy playing Walk the Plank as much as I have enjoyed developing it.

ruerob.

P.S.: a Wii U Browser compatible version you can find here: http://ruerob.bplaced.net/wtp
